string_table.str: Just let me collect my equipment.
Can't wait to get down there.
A perfect chance for a field test!
Our Spartan is at low health.
Our Spartan is at low health.
Our Spartan is at low health.
If we sent out a scout, we could see what the enemy is doing.
A scouting unit may be able to find out what the enemy is doing.
We should send out a scouting unit to find out what the enemy are up to.
We've detected a large enemy force coming this way!
Alert, we've detected a large incoming force!
Watch out, we've got a large enemy force on the way!
The enemy has neglected to produce any power!
The enemy has neglected to produce any power!
The enemy has neglected to produce any power!
We should take some points before the enemy does.
The enemy has forgotten to capture any points. We should take them first.
The enemy isn't capturing any points. Let's take advantage of that.
Most of the enemy's forces are vehicles.
The enemy is concentrating on vehicles.
Most of the enemy's forces are ground troops.
The enemy is recruiting ground troops.
The enemy is concentrating on ground troops.
Most of the enemy's forces are air units.
The enemy is recruiting air units.
The enemy is concentrating on air units.
The enemy is recruiting heavy units.
The enemy is producing heavy units.
The enemy is building heavy units.
The enemy is recruiting artillery units.
The enemy is producing artillery units.
The enemy is building artillery units.
The enemy is recruiting air units.
The enemy is producing air units.
The enemy is building air units.
An allied base is under attack!
An allied base is under attack!
An allied base is under attack!
Our allies are attacking the enemy base !
Our allies are attacking the enemy base !
Our allies are attacking the enemy base !
It's time for battle! Any new tricks to show me?
Good to see you here. I'm ready to back you up!
Welcome, Commander. Are you ready to fight?
We'll need some supply pads if we want to produce supplies.
We're going to need some supply, call in some supply pads.
We're not producing any supplies, call in some supply pads.
We're not producing any power, call in a Generator.
We're going to need a Generator to produce power.
We don't have any power income, call in a Generator.
Almost ready to test my new toys!
Almost ready to test my new toys!
I'm ready for a field test!
I'm ready for a field test!
We're losing Control Tower E to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower E to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower D to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower D to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower C to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower C to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower B to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower B to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower A to the enemy!
We're losing Control Tower A to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower E to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower E to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower D to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower D to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower C to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower C to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower B to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower B to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower A to the enemy!
We've lost Control Tower A to the enemy!
The enemy has captured Control Tower E!
The enemy has captured Control Tower E!

The enemy has captured Control Tower D!
The enemy has captured Control Tower C!
The enemy has captured Control Tower C!
The enemy has captured Control Tower B!
The enemy has captured Control Tower B!
The enemy has captured Control Tower A!
The enemy has captured Control Tower A!
We've located the enemy's Super unit.
We've detected the enemy's Super unit.
Watch out, the enemy has a Spartan.
The enemy has a Spartan on the field.
The enemy has an Honor Guard.
Enemy Honor Guard on the field.
The enemy has an Elite Honor Guard on the field.
Alert, the enemy has a Condor.
The enemy has a Warlord in play.
We have located the enemy Hero unit.
I think we've earned a break after that. Unless of course you're on a roll?
Just goes to show you, brains beats brawn. Well, sometimes anyway.
We really handed it to them today! Hmm, must be my superior tech.
Let's not get complacent. They'll be itching for a rematch.
Well fought. We beat the bad guys - for now, at least.
I'm not really one for pep talks, but we did well today. Uh, congratulations.
We fought well, but next time maybe don't cut it so close?
I wasn't sure we'd make it.
That was very close, but the important thing is we won!
We're tied! There's still everything to fight for!
We're tied! There's still everything to fight for!
We're tied! There's still everything to fight for!
We're close to winning the battle!
We're close to winning the battle!
We're close to winning the battle!
We're close to losing the battle!
We're close to losing the battle!
We're close to losing the battle!
That didn't go well. How about we just call that a 'fact-finding mission'?
That did not go well. Let's analyze what went wrong so we can come back stronger.
We were hopelessly outmatched. We're going to have to take a closer look at our strategies.
We lost, they won. It's the law of averages.
We did our best, they were just a little better.
We've lost this one, but there'll be plenty of other chances.
That could have gone either way, maybe next time.
That was close, but let's concentrate on the next one, shall we?
Keep going, we've nearly beaten them!
Keep going, we've nearly beaten them!
Keep going, we've nearly beaten them!
If we don't act fast we'll lose the battle!
If we don't act fast we'll lose the battle!
If we don't act fast we'll lose the battle!
Pay attention, school is in session.
Pay attention, school is in session.
Pay attention, school is in session.

This unit requires Tech level two.

We've taken out the enemy Hero.
We've brought down an enemy Condor!
What happened? We're on your side!
Those were our units! We don't need you helping the enemy!
What are you doing? We're not supposed to be fighting each other!
